name: Confined (Easton Entertainment)
description:
Confined was created over a weekend as a concept for procedural interiors, but has been worked on to be made into a horror arcade style game.

Confined is a maze of corridors, where you must try to take out as many monsters as you can before they take you out. 

Will you be able to escape with you life or will you be stuck forever?

Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • L-Shift - Run
  • Space - Jump
  • L-Mouse - Fire
  • R-Mouse - Reload
  • Esc - Pause
